name: RECPLAY
description:
Teach an AI what moves it should do in order to reach the end, but don't get him stuck !

I'm actually suprised I managed to get the game done almost at the submission closing.

Source code :

https://auroriax.github.io/PuzzleScript/play.html?p=4ceecaa4b97da6a0f2fb606c716a...

Controls :

Arrow keys to move
X to start / stop recording
Z to undo, R to restart
